meanings.definition: The period of time between 20 and 29 years old.
meanings.sent1: In her twenties, Sarah traveled to many countries.
meanings.sent2: People often say the twenties are a time of self-discovery.
meanings.sent3: During her twenties, Emma thought she could learn to fly.
meanings.sent4: The twenties are like a bridge between adolescence and adulthood.
meanings.sent5: His twenties were filled with laughter, tears, and growth.

meanings.definition: A group or set of twenty items.
meanings.sent1: The store sold twenties of pencils in a pack.
meanings.sent2: She bought a bag of candies that contained twenties of different flavors.
meanings.sent3: At the party, they played a game with twenties of colorful balloons.
meanings.sent4: The jar was filled with twenties of shiny marbles.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest held twenties of sparkling gems.

meanings.sent1: The math book explained how to add and subtract with the twenties.
meanings.sent2: When counting, don't forget to include the twenties.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled when they learned about the twenties in class.
meanings.sent4: The lottery ticket had the winning numbers in the twenties.
meanings.sent5: The clock struck the hour with the chime of the twenties.
